title: Microphone not working when Pixel 3 is laid down flat
content:
Phone is working properly without issue during regular call. However if i want to use speaker during a call and let my phone laid down on the table here the trouble start. Microphone is not working at all as soon my phone stay laid down on table. I have to keep my phone in my hand in order to have people able to hear me. Anyone notice this issue ?
Thanks
